TopicTitle: Broax Space Industries: Rate my flags!

Articles.Content:
So 1.0 is dawning upon us. That means a clean install of KSP in preparation, make a fresh checklist of mods (and then patiently wait for their release) aaaaand... NEW FLAGS! I took this as an opportunity to freshen up my Illustrator skills...

I've decided to make an official logo for my space program and this is the time to reveal:

I took some base inspiration from SpaceX's logo and extended from that... Broax is my name around here (and most games) and then the "X" is supposed to symbolize a craft going into orbit.

But this is just the logo... The whole flag will look like this:

This will be the general purpose flag for Kerbin orbiting missions. General satellites, tests, etc. The flag colors are green to represent Kerbalkind and blue representing space exploration. I'll have multiple flags for each mission but the main theme (colors and logo) will be the same for all.

Each routine mission will have its own flag according to which celestial body the mission will take place in (Kerbin, Mun, Minmus, Duna, Ike, etc). There will be specific flags for special missions (1st Kerbal in space will have the Kersok-1 flag, 1st Mun landing will have a Kerpollo 11 flag, etc) and I'm considering special flags for career contracts (rescue missions, experiments, etc).
